description: The PB_INVOICE table contains information about premium billing invoices.

columns.name: PB_INVC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the premium billing invoice.

columns.name: INV_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates the current status of the invoice (printed, payment received, etc.)


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Created


Printed


Payment Received


Closed


Cancelled


Approved


Rejected


Released


Disputed


Not Printed - Paperless

columns.name: PB_ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the premium billing account associated with the invoice.

columns.name: EFF_MONTH
columns.description: Effective period for the invoice. This date will correspond to the cycle date of the billing cycle used to generate this invoice.

columns.name: INV_NUM
columns.description: Invoice number generated using the account ID and the account invoicing sequence number.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: The extract date and time of the record for this table.

columns.name: PRESUMED_PAYMENT_ID
columns.description: The ID of the payment that pays this invoice.

columns.name: GRACE_EXCLUSION_YN
columns.description:
Controls whether an invoice is considered an exception to the FFM grace period rules


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes
